# Aim of the course
## Topics covered
- Class 2: Fundamental issues I: MAUP & spatial autocorrelation
- Class 3: Spatio-temporal analysis
- Class 4: Spatial and spatio-temporal analysis in the big data era
- Class 5: Fundamental issues II: MTUP, UGCoP & uncertain point observation
- Class 6: Emerging spatial data sources
- Class 7: Ethics and geoprivacy issues
